programme.desc: A former track coach decides to train a student with natural athletic talent. Tragedy strikes, forcing the student to confront everything that has been holding him back.

programme.title: Next Door Spy
programme.desc: Ten-year old Agathe-Christine, or simply AC, likes mysteries and from the basement in the building, where she has just moved in, she has established a small detective bureau.

programme.title: Treasure Hounds
programme.desc: Young Jack inherits a dog, Skipper, who can talk! After learning that his Grandpa left a priceless Spanish treasure hidden in the town, Jack and his friends are on the hunt!

programme.title: A Boy Called Po
programme.desc: After his wife dies of cancer, an overworked engineer struggles to care for his son with autism. His son in response to bullying regresses into a fantasy world escape.

programme.title: Spy Dog
programme.desc: Toby appears to be an ordinary dog living the simple put life, but unbeknownst to his family, he moonlights as secret government operative, Agent Toby Barks.

programme.title: Madeline
programme.desc: The adventurous Madeline must use all of her wits to prevent the sale of her beloved school and home in Paris.

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: When zookeeper Griffin considers leaving, his beloved animals decide to break their time-honored code of silence and help their kindhearted caretaker out, animal style.

programme.title: Adventures of a Boy Genius
programme.desc: A 12 year-old boy genius teams up with a quirky teacher to solve a crime and save his family from splitting up, all while trying to win over his first crush.

programme.title: House Arrest
programme.desc: A suburban couple suddenly finds themselves locked in the basement together under orders from their kids to reconcile their differences.

programme.title: Terra Willy: Unexplored Planet
programme.desc: Following the destruction of their ship, young Willy is separated from his parents with whom he traveled through space. His rescue capsule lands on a wild and unexplored planet.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' the Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

programme.title: Magic in the Water
programme.desc: A father and his two children rediscover the strength of the family bond during a magical summer vacation.

programme.title: The Bbq
programme.desc: Dazza has a passion for barbequing, but when he accidentally gives his neighbours food poisoning, his reputation is on the line. To make amends he seeks help from a tyrannical chef.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he turns his son down for the last time.

programme.title: The Unicorn S1 Ep05
